translations: 上升；上浮（ascent 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: The book is full, you will see, of a number of descents and ascents.
sentences.translation: 你们将会读到，本书充满一些下降与上升的句子。

sentences.sentence: None-the-less I have been pretty successful in my recent ascents.
sentences.translation: 再有，我在最近的完攀路线上表现的都非常漂亮。

sentences.sentence: I really looked up to people who did first ascents and put up things in lots of different styles.
sentences.translation: 我的确很敬佩那些首攀高难度路线并且风格鲜明的人。
